title: Honor rank not showing up
body: This isn't really that big of a deal, but my honor 4 border thingy isn't appearing in champion loading screen. Is this a bug or do I have to do something else?

replies.body: Last I checked, you need to get honored by 1 random teammate or 2 members of your premade to have that honor flair show up on the loading screen!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=J7Lh73iJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-29T01:38:09.367+0000)
>
> Last I checked, you need to get honored by 1 random teammate or 2 members of your premade to have that honor flair show up on the loading screen!

so if i get honored 1 game, then the next itll show up?

Pretty sure yep! The flairs only last for one match so you need to get honored again to have it keep showing up. It's basically a way of saying "Hey, this guy must have done something pretty cool in the last game they played!"
